CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 9 In this study , PQCDTB has been successfully synthesized through the Suzuki coupling reaction by introducing planar quinacridone unit and a broad - absorption benzothiadiazole unit.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |
| planar quinacridone unit |
| a broad - absorption benzothiadiazole unit |

In this paragraph, the "Material Name" entities refer to three different materials: PQCDTB, planar quinacridone unit, and a broad - absorption benzothiadiazole unit. These entities are involved in the synthesis process described in the study.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PQCDTB |

After reviewing the paragraph again, I realized that only one material name is explicitly mentioned: PQCDTB. The other two entities, "planar quinacridone unit" and "a broad - absorption benzothiadiazole unit," are not clearly identified as materials in the text. They are described as components of the synthesized material, but their status as materials is not explicitly stated. Therefore, I have removed them from the list of entities.

In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities refer to the specific components or units involved in the synthesis process of PQCDTB. These entities include PQCDTB itself, as well as the planar quinacridone unit and the broad - absorption benzothiadiazole unit.
